EmailTemplate.name: RE: Your MBO account is now active (1350589360.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Your MBO account is now active (1350589360.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Matt, Here is the link to order the cards https://burdgecooper.net/mboassociate/ <https://burdgecooper.net/mboassociate/>. Since you had to wait so long for the answer MBO would like to cover the cost of the first 250 cards. So please just let me know cost when you are done ordering (you can forward me the email confirmation) and I ensure we ledger that amount back into your MBO account. Thanks for your patience as I figured this out! Sara___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Kevin Windham [mailto:k.matthew.windham@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, October 12, 2012 2:58 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Your MBO account is now active Sara, How do I order business cards? I haven't seen a link on the website, and I think it would be best if I had some with the MBO Partners logo on them. MattOn Wed, Sep 26, 2012 at 8:00 AM, <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Dear Matt, Welcome to MBO Partners! Now that your Business Center is active with us, I would like to schedule a time to walk through the MBO system with you, please review my calendar at my.timedriver.com <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> to set up a convenient time for you. Should you have any additional questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you,Sara CondeBusiness Manager Direct: 703-793-6028 <tel:703-793-6028> Toll Free: 800-556-0270 <tel:800-556-0270>MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171]http://www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com>Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
